verses.verse: My son <S%H1121><s%>, forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not my Torah <S%H8451><s%>; but let thine heart <S%H3820><s%> keep <S%H5341><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>:
For length <S%H753><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%>, and long <S%H8141><s%> life <S%H2416><s%>, and peace <S%H7965><s%>, shall they add <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to thee.

Let not mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee: bind <S%H7194><s%> <S%H8798><s%> them about thy neck <S%H1621><s%>; write <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8798><s%> them upon the table <S%H3871><s%> of thine heart <S%H3820><s%>:
So shalt thou find <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8798><s%> favour <S%H2580><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%> understanding <S%H7922><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> and man <S%H120><s%>.
Trust <S%H982><s%> <S%H8798><s%> in the YY <S%H3068><s%> with all thine heart <S%H3820><s%>; and lean <S%H8172><s%> <S%H8735><s%> not unto thine own understanding <S%H998><s%>.
In all thy ways <S%H1870><s%> acknowledge <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8798><s%> him, and he shall direct <S%H3474><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thy paths <S%H734><s%>.
Be not wise <S%H2450><s%> in thine own eyes <S%H5869><s%>: fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and depart <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8798><s%> from evil <S%H7451><s%>.
It shall be health <S%H7500><s%> to thy navel <S%H8270><s%>, and marrow <S%H8250><s%> to thy bones <S%H6106><s%>.
Honour <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> with thy substance <S%H1952><s%>, and with the firstfruits <S%H7225><s%> of all thine increase <S%H8393><s%>:
So shall thy barns <S%H618><s%> be filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with plenty <S%H7647><s%>, and thy presses <S%H3342><s%> shall burst out <S%H6555><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with new wine <S%H8492><s%>.
My son <S%H1121><s%>, despise <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not the chastening <S%H4148><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>; neither be weary <S%H6973><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of his correction <S%H8433><s%>:

For whom the YY <S%H3068><s%> loveth <S%H157><s%> <S%H8799><s%> he correcteth <S%H3198><s%> <S%H8686><s%>; even as a father <S%H1><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> in whom he delighteth <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Happy <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H120><s%> that findeth <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, and the man <S%H120><s%> that getteth <S%H6329><s%> <S%H8686><s%> understanding <S%H8394><s%>.
For the merchandise <S%H5504><s%> of it is better <S%H2896><s%> than the merchandise <S%H5505><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and the gain <S%H8393><s%> thereof than fine gold <S%H2742><s%>.
She is more precious <S%H3368><s%> than rubies <S%H6443><s%>: and all the things thou canst desire <S%H2656><s%> are not to be compared <S%H7737><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto her.
Length <S%H753><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%> is in her right hand <S%H3225><s%>; and in her left hand <S%H8040><s%> riches <S%H6239><s%> and honour <S%H3519><s%>.
Her ways <S%H1870><s%> are ways <S%H1870><s%> of pleasantness <S%H5278><s%>, and all her paths <S%H5410><s%> are peace <S%H7965><s%>.

She is a tree <S%H6086><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> to them that lay hold <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8688><s%> upon her: and happy <S%H833><s%> <S%H8794><s%> is every one that retaineth <S%H8551><s%> <S%H8802><s%> her.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> by wisdom <S%H2451><s%> hath founded <S%H3245><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>; by understanding <S%H8394><s%> hath he established <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8790><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>.
By his knowledge <S%H1847><s%> the depths <S%H8415><s%> are broken up <S%H1234><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and the clouds <S%H7834><s%> drop down <S%H7491><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the dew <S%H2919><s%>.
My son <S%H1121><s%>, let not them depart <S%H3868><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>: keep <S%H5341><s%> <S%H8798><s%> sound wisdom <S%H8454><s%> and discretion <S%H4209><s%>:
So shall they be life <S%H2416><s%> unto thy soul <S%H5315><s%>, and grace <S%H2580><s%> to thy neck <S%H1621><s%>.
Then shalt thou walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in thy way <S%H1870><s%> safely <S%H983><s%>, and thy foot <S%H7272><s%> shall not stumble <S%H5062><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

When thou liest down <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, thou shalt not be afraid <S%H6342><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: yea, thou shalt lie down <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and thy sleep <S%H8142><s%> shall be sweet <S%H6149><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.
Be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of sudden <S%H6597><s%> fear <S%H6343><s%>, neither of the desolation <S%H7722><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, when it cometh <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
For the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall be thy confidence <S%H3689><s%>, and shall keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy foot <S%H7272><s%> from being taken <S%H3921><s%>.

Withhold <S%H4513><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not good <S%H2896><s%> from them to whom it is due <S%H1167><s%>, when it is in the power <S%H410><s%> of thine hand <S%H3027><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it.

Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not unto thy neighbour <S%H7453><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and come again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and to morrow <S%H4279><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; when thou hast <S%H3426><s%> it by thee.
Devise <S%H2790><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not evil <S%H7451><s%> against thy neighbour <S%H7453><s%>, seeing he dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> securely <S%H983><s%> by thee.
Strive <S%H7378><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not with a man <S%H120><s%> without cause <S%H2600><s%>, if he have done <S%H1580><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee no harm <S%H7451><s%>.
Envy <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thou not the oppressor <S%H376><s%> <S%H2555><s%>, and choose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%> none of his ways <S%H1870><s%>.
For the froward <S%H3868><s%> <S%H8737><s%> is abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the YY <S%H3068><s%>: but his secret <S%H5475><s%> is with the righteous <S%H3477><s%>.

The curse <S%H3994><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> is in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>: but he blesseht <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the habitation <S%H5116><s%> of the just <S%H6662><s%>.

Surely he scorneth <S%H3887><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the scorners <S%H3887><s%> <S%H8801><s%>: but he giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> unto the lowly <S%H6035><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H6041><s%>.
The wise <S%H2450><s%> shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8799><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%>: but shame <S%H7036><s%> shall be the promotion <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8688><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%>.
